name: Visit Panda Base And Cooking Class
description:
This trip is designed for those who love Panda and cooking. Visiting these majesty creature is the must-do while your stay in Chengdu, and you can also experience authentic Chinese cooking in a local family under the teaching of a family hostess.
What Make Us Special?  
•  Superb Cook from local families
•  Focus on Sichuan Food
•  Full Participation in the cooking process
•  Enjoy what you cook.
•  Flexibility on courses and timing.
•  Complementary Tibetan Yak Butter Te
